title: Critical Instructional Design and Creative Learning Environment Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: For pre-professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, emphasizing collaborative learning and project-based assessments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and critique the historical development of instructional design theories.
Learners can design science-subject customized learning modules using participatory and collaborative approaches.
Through project-based assessments, learners can apply their instructional designs to real learning contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
